scripts.postinstall: npm run install-gitbook && npm run install-repl
scripts.install-gitbook: sed -i 's/,"elm-repl"//' book.json && gitbook install && sed -i 's/"youtube"/"youtube","elm-repl"/' book.json
scripts.install-repl: cd repl && npm link && npm i && npm run build && cd ../ && npm link gitbook-plugin-elm-repl
scripts.build: rimraf _book && rimraf docs && gitbook build && mv _book docs && rimraf docs/**/*.md && sed -i 's/検索すると入力/検索/g' docs/*.html docs/**/*.html && cpx favicon.ico _book/gitbook/images/
